=WINDOWS Installation Instructions=
==Requires java/jre 5 or better==

  # Download and install the latest version of java from suns website (if you already have java 5 or better you can skip this step) 
  # Download _DecafWin.zip_
  # Download speech pack if you want Speech enabled _DecafSpeech.zip_
  # Extract the files above where you want them.(they both contain a Decaf base directory) 
  # To run without speech double click on _Decaf.jar_
  # To run with speech double click on _DecafSpeech.jar_
